CustomField.description: Indicates a Constituent that meets one or more of the following criteria. 1) Has an active ND Affiliation = Campaign Cabinet, Advisory Council, Advisory Board 2) >$1M Lifetime Giving 3) Manually designated
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates a Constituent that meets one or more of the following criteria. 1) Has an active ND Affiliation = Campaign Cabinet, Advisory Council, Advisory Board 2) >$1M Lifetime Giving 3) Manually designated
CustomField.label: VIP
